article.title: Status and history for zam
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: replaced U+0027 ' APOSTROPHE by U+02BC ' MODIFIER LETTER APOSTROPHE; fixed one U+0078 x LATIN SMALL LETTER X into U+0058 X LATIN CAPITAL LETTER X (first letter of one of the preamble article)
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
